[93mproton[0m [93madsorption[0m [93mcompetes[0m with the [93mformation[0m of [93mH[0m [93m2[0m [93mmolecules[0m [93mvia[0m an [93mEley[0m-[93mRideal[0m [93mprocess[0m. [93mmethods[0m and is [93mfully[0m [93mreversible[0m [93mvia[0m the [93moxidative[0m [93mdesorption[0m of [93mprotons[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mdemonstrate[0m that the [93mproton[0m [93mreduction[0m [93mrate[0m in [93mdefect[0m-[93mfree[0m [93mgraphene[0m [93mcan[0m be [93menhanced[0m by an [93morder[0m of [93mmagnitude[0m by the [93mintroduction[0m of [93mnanoscale[0m [93mcorrugations[0m in its [93mlattice[0m, and that the [93msubstitution[0m of [93mprotons[0m for [93mdeuterons[0m [93mresults[0m [93mboth[0m in [93mlower[0m [93mpotentials[0m for the [93mhydrogenation[0m [93mprocess[0m and in a [93mmore[0m [93mstable[0m [93mcompound[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mpave[0m the [93mway[0m to This [93mtrend[0m was [93mparticularly[0m [93mevident[0m among [93mnon[0m-[93mvital[0m [93mteeth[0m, [93mespecially[0m those with a [93mpost[0m and [93mcore[0m or [93mprevious[0m [93mroot[0m [93mcanal[0m [93mtreatment[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mdue[0m to the [93mretrospective[0m [92mdesign[0m and [93mpotential[0m [93minclusion[0m [93mbias[0m, these [93mfindings[0m [93mshould[0m be [93minterpreted[0m with [93mcaution[0m. [93mClinical[0m [93msignificance[0m: Within the [93mlimitations[0m of this [93mretrospective[0m, [93mnon[0m-[93mrandomized[0m [93mstudy[0m, [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mlarge[0m [93mdirect[0m [93mrestorations[0m [93mappeared[0m to [93mhave[0m [93mslightly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93msurvival[0m and a [93msomewhat[0m [93mhigher[0m [93mneed[0m for [93mretreatment[0m than [93mteeth[0m [93mrestored[0m with [93mcrowns[0m. - Are [93mall[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m [93mequally[0m [93mneurotoxic[0m? [93mInfluence[0m of [93msize[0m and [93msurface[0m [93mfunctionalization[0m on the [93mtoxicity[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m in [93mhuman[0m [93mneuronal[0m [93mcells[0m.: [93mNanoplastics[0m ([93mNPs[0m) are an [93memerging[0m [93menvironmental[0m [93mconcern[0m, [93mparticularly[0m [93mdue[0m to [93mtheir[0m [93mpotential[0m [93minteractions[0m with the [93mnervous[0m [92msystem[0m. [93mWe[0m [93mevaluated[0m the [93mneurotoxic[0m [93meffects[0m of [93mfour[0m [93mtypes[0m of [93mpolystyrene[0m [93mnanoplastics[0m ([93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m): [93munmodified[0m ([93mplain[0m) [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m, and [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m [93mparticles[0m [93mfunctionalized[0m with [93mcarboxyl[0m ([93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m) or [93mamine[0m (A-[93mNPs[0m) [93mgroups[0m. [93mHuman[0m [93mSH[0m-[93mSY5Y[0m [93mneuroblastoma[0m [93mcells[0m were [93mexposed[0m to [93m1[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m for [93m24[0m or [93m48[0m [93mhours[0m. [93mDynamic[0m [93mlight[0m [93mscattering[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93maggregation[0m of [93mplain[0m [93m50[0m [93mnm[0m [93mNPs[0m in [93mwater[0m, while [93mpresence[0m of ≥[93m1[0m% [93mfetal[0m [93mbovine[0m [93mserum[0m [93mimproved[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m [93macross[0m [93mall[0m [93mparticle[0m [93mtypes[0m. [93mZeta[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mwater[0m were [93mapproximately[0m -[93m45[0m [93mmV[0m for [93mplain[0m and [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and -[93m30[0m [93mmV[0m for A-[93mNPs[0m. In [93mcomplete[0m [93mmedium[0m, [93mall[0m [93mvalues[0m [93mshifted[0m [93mtoward[0m -[93m20[0m to -[93m13[0m [93mmV[0m, [93mconsistent[0m with [93mprotein[0m [93mcorona[0m [93mformation[0m. [93mIntegrating[0m [93mcolloidal[0m [93mstability[0m, [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m, and [93morganelle[0m-[93mlevel[0m [93manalyses[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mestablished[0m a [93munified[0m [93mmechanistic[0m [92mframework[0m for [93mPS[0m-[93mNP[0m [93mneurotoxicity[0m. [93mToxicity[0m [93mendpoints[0m [93mincluded[0m [93mcell[0m [93mviability[0m, [93mROS[0m/[93mRNS[0m [93mgeneration[0m, [93mparticle[0m [93minternalization[0m, and [93mmorphological[0m and [93multrastructural[0m [93manalysis[0m. [93mPlain[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m [93mshowed[0m [93mnegligible[0m [93mcytotoxicity[0m, [93mwhereas[0m [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m and [93mespecially[0m A-[93mNPs[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93mreduced[0m [93mcell[0m [93mviability[0m. A-[93mNPs[0m [93mcaused[0m a [93m21[0m-[93m41[0m% [93mreduction[0m at [93m100[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m after [93m24[0m [93mh[0m, and [93m29[0m-[93m66[0m% at [93m200[0m-[93m500[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m after [93m48[0m [93mh[0m ([93mp[0m = [93m0[0m.[93m0007[0m [93mvs[0m. [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m). [93mROS[0m/[93mRNS[0m [93mlevels[0m were [93mhighest[0m with [93mplain[0m [93m100[0m [93mnm[0m and A-[93mNPs[0m at ≥[93m200[0m [93mμg[0m [93mmL[0m -[93m1[0m , [93mincreasing[0m over [93mtime[0m. [93mTransmission[0m [93melectron[0m [93mmicroscopy[0m [93mrevealed[0m [93msize[0m- and [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m-[93mdependent[0m [93mdamage[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mendoplasmic[0m [93mreticulum[0m [93mdilation[0m, [93mGolgi[0m [93mfragmentation[0m, and [93mmitochondrial[0m [93mabnormalities[0m. [93mInternalization[0m [93mfollowed[0m the [93mtrend[0m A-[93mNPs[0m > [93mC[0m-[93mNPs[0m ≫ [93mplain[0m [93mPS[0m-[93mNPs[0m, [93mmirroring[0m [93morganelle[0m [93mdamage[0m, [93mapoptosis[0m, [93mautophagy[0m, and [93mlysosomal[0m [93mdisruption[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93midentify[0m [93msurface[0m [93mchemistry[0m, [93mmore[0m than [93mparticle[0m [93msize[0m, as the [93mprimary[0m [93mdriver[0m of [93mPS[0m-[93mNP[0m [93mneurotoxicity[0m, [93mhighlighting[0m its [93mimportance[0m for [93mrisk[0m [93mprioritization[0m and [93mregulatory[0m [93mframeworks[0m [93maddressing[0m [93mNP[0m [93mhazards[0m.

[93mearly[0m [93mmortality[0m [93mmarkedly[0m [93mreduced[0m over the [93mpast[0m [93mdecades[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93machieving[0m [93mdurable[0m [93mleft[0m [93matrioventricular[0m [93mvalve[0m ([93mLAVV[0m) [93mcompetence[0m and [93mpreserving[0m [93mleft[0m [93mventricular[0m [93moutflow[0m [93mtract[0m ([93mLVOT[0m) [93mgeometry[0m [93mremain[0m [93mcritical[0m [93mdeterminants[0m of [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93msuccess[0m.[93mMethodsThis[0m [93mreview[0m [93msummarizes[0m the [93manatomical[0m [93mprinciples[0m, [93moperative[0m [93mdetails[0m, and [93mclinical[0m [93moutcomes[0m of the [93mNunn[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93msingle[0m-[93mpatch[0m ("[93mAustralian[0m") [93mtechnique[0m for [93mCAVSD[0m [93mrepair[0m.[93mResultsThe[0m [93mAustralian[0m [93mtechnique[0m-[93mcharacterized[0m by [93mdirect[0m [93mapproximation[0m of [93mbridging[0m [93mleaflets[0m to the [93mseptal[0m [93mcrest[0m without a [93mventricular[0m [93mpatch[0m-[93mdemonstrates[0m [93msuperior[0m [93mpreservation[0m of [93mLVOT[0m [92marchitecture[0m and [93mpromotes[0m [93msymmetrical[0m [93mLAVV[0m [93mcoaptation[0m. [93mContemporary[0m [93mseries[0m [93mreport[0m >[93m90[0m% [93mfreedom[0m from [93mLAVV[0m [93mreoperation[0m and >[93m97[0m% [93mfreedom[0m from [93mLVOT[0m [93mobstruction[0m at [93m10[0m-[93m15[0m [93myears[0m, These [93madvantages[0m are [93mconsistent[0m [93macross[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mspectrum[0m of [93mventricular[0m [93mseptal[0m [93mdefect[0m [93msizes[0m and [93mpatient[0m [93mages[0m, [93mprovided[0m [93manatomical[0m [93mprerequisites[0m are [93mmet[0m.[93mConclusionsBy[0m [93mminimizing[0m [93mprosthetic[0m [93mmaterial[0m and [93mrestoring[0m [93mnative[0m [93mleaflet[0m [93mgeometry[0m, the [93mAustralian[0m [93mRepair[0m [93machieves[0m [93mexcellent[0m [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mvalve[0m [93mcompetence[0m and [93mreoperation[0m-[93mfree[0m [93msurvival[0m. It [93mshould[0m be [93mconsidered[0m a [93mfirst[0m-[93mline[0m [93moption[0m in [93mappropriately[0m [93mselected[0m [93mCAVSD[0m [93mpatients[0m, [93mparticularly[0m where [93mdurable[0m [93mLAVV[0m [93mfunction[0m and [93mLVOT[0m [93mintegrity[0m are [93mparamount[0m.
- [93mHierarchically[0m [93mPorous[0m [93mNitrogen[0m-[93mDoped[0m [93mCarbon[0m with [93mHigh[0m [93mConductivity[0m for [93mRapid[0m and [93mEfficient[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) [93mReduction[0m.: [93mCarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mderived[0m from [93mmetal[0m-[93morganic[0m [93mframeworks[0m [93mtypically[0m [93mexhibit[0m [93mmicroporous[0m [93mstructures[0m and [93mlow[0m [93mconductivity[0m, which [93msignificantly[0m [93mlimit[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m. [93mHerein[0m, an [93meffective[0m [93mstrategy[0m to [93mprepare[0m [93mdodecahedral[0m [93mhierarchical[0m [93mporous[0m [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mcarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcomposites[0m ([93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m) by [93musing[0m [93mZIF[0m-[93m8[0m [93mencapsulated[0m with [93mionic[0m [93mliquid[0m as [93mpyrolysis[0m [93mprecursors[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) [93mreduction[0m is [93mdeveloped[0m. The [93mencapsulated[0m [93mionic[0m [93mliquid[0m [93mhelps[0m to [93mprecisely[0m [93mregulate[0m the [93mhierarchically[0m [93mporous[0m [93mstructure[0m in [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m. This [93mhierarchically[0m [93mporous[0m [93mstructure[0m not only [93mcreates[0m a [93mfavorable[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mmicroenvironment[0m, [93mfacilitating[0m the [93mmass[0m [93mtransfer[0m of [93mCr[0m [93mspecies[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93minteraction[0m with [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m, but [93malso[0m [93menhancing[0m the [93mconductivity[0m of [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m and [93mconsequently[0m [93maccelerating[0m the [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m of •[93mCO[0m [93m2[0m - [93mradicals[0m to [93mCr[0m [93mspecies[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mspeeding[0m up the [93mreduction[0m [93mprocess[0m of [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m). [93mAdditionally[0m, with the [93mcalcination[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mincreasing[0m, the [93mcontent[0m of [93mdefective[0m [93mC[0m [93mincreases[0m, and [93mN[0m [93mspecies[0m [93mprogressively[0m [93mtransforms[0m into [93mgraphitic[0m-[93mcenter[0m [93mN[0m ([93mN3[0m). [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m [93mcalculations[0m [93mreveal[0m that the [93mdefective[0m [93mC[0m [93mactive[0m [93mcenter[0m [93msubstantially[0m [93mdecreases[0m the [93mfree[0m [93menergy[0m [91mchange[0m of the [93mrate[0m-[93mdetermining[0m [93mstep[0m (from [93mCr[0m([93mIV[0m) to [93mCr[0m([93mIII[0m)) through the [93msynergistic[0m [93meffect[0m of [93mN3[0m. [93mGiven[0m these [93moutstanding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m, the [93moptimized[0m [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mcan[0m [93mcompletely[0m [93mreduce[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) ([93m333[0m.[93m3[0m [93mmg[0m [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m ) in an [93moxalic[0m [93macid[0m [93msolution[0m within [93m2[0m [93mmin[0m, [93moutperforming[0m its [93mcounterparts[0m without a [93mhierarchical[0m [93mstructure[0m and those [93mcalcined[0m at [93msignificantly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mtemperatures[0m.

- [93mHigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m [93mcharge[0m.: [93mTopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m of [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93minsulators[0m ([93mHOTIs[0m) not only [93mserve[0m as a [93munique[0m [93msignature[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopology[0m, but [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m [93mtremendous[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mprobing[0m, [93mconfining[0m, and [93mmanipulating[0m [93mparticles[0m or [93mquasiparticles[0m as [93mpossible[0m [93mcarriers[0m of [93minformation[0m and [93menergy[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mtopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m are [93mnecessarily[0m [93mpinned[0m to [93mcertain[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mpositions[0m at the [93mouter[0m [93mboundary[0m of a [93mHOTI[0m [93msample[0m, [93mimposing[0m [93mstrict[0m [93mlimitations[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93muse[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93mnumber[0m and [93mpositioning[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpropose[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mconcept[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m ([93mHOTPS[0m) at [93m0D[0m [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mHOTIs[0m that [93mcarry[0m a [93mfractional[0m [93mcharge[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m, to [93movercome[0m the [93mlimitations[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mExploiting[0m this [93mnew[0m [93mconcept[0m for the [93mHOTI[0m [93mphase[0m in a [93mKekulé[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexperimentally[0m [93mrealize[0m [93mHOTPS[0m in [93mboth[0m [93macoustic[0m and [93mphotonic[0m [93mmetamaterials[0m.
